thread.title: Perfect365® Confirms Current Availability in Apple App Store
thread.title_full: Perfect365® Confirms Current Availability in Apple App Store

author: admin
title: Perfect365® Confirms Current Availability in Apple App Store
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/20/2015 @ 10:01 PM   ArcSoft, Inc. 
FREMONT, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Perfect365, headquartered in Fremont, CA, is the #1 celebrity-favorite, digital makeover app worldwide with more than 65 million users. ArcSoft confirms the app is still chart topping and available in the Apple App Store. 
As a number of news outlets recently reported, Apple has removed more than 250 apps from the App Store after it was discovered they were accessing users’ private data through a third-party advertising tool developed by Youmi. 
Many sites have incorrectly listed digital makeover app Perfect365 as being affected by this issue. 
Perfect365 does not and has never used this Youmi advertising tool, and has not been removed from the App Store. Perfect365 remains at the top of the App store charts and is the number one digital makeover app for selfies. The list of affected apps being published by many news organizations is not related to this story. 
For correct information about the Youmi advertising tool and its affects, please visit the report published by SourceDNA on Sunday, October 18. 
Reportedly loved by celebrities, Perfect365 uses ArcSoft's Face Detection technology to achieve the most accurate digital makeup placement on cell phone portraits, allowing users to try dozens of on-trend makeup styles with just one tap. For more information about Perfect365, please visit perfect365.arcsoft.com . 
About ArcSoft 
ArcSoft is the global leader in imaging intelligence technology. Now in our 20th year, we use our world-class Intelligent Imaging™ to enable visual ‘thinking' capabilities in more than 1.5 billion of today’s most popular smartphones. 
ArcSoft is the creative team behind a line of innovative consumer products including simplicam® powered by Closeli®, the first and only home monitoring Wi-Fi video solution with Face Recognition. 
For our device partners in computers, digital cameras, the hottest wearables, TVs, home appliances and cloud storage, we provide a full line of advanced imaging solutions including face and object recognition/detection, content-based analysis for pictures and video, studio-quality image and video enhancement. Our corporate customers and partners include many of the world’s leading OEMs and chip manufacturers, including companies like Amazon, Samsung, Nikon, Olympus, Canon, Sony, Panasonic, Lenovo, Sharp and Qualcomm. For more information, please visit: www.arcsoft.com . Follow @ArcSoft on Twitter and visit us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/arcsoftinc .
